title: Germany’s New Armed Vehicles to be Made in Australia
description: Members from 2nd/14th Light Horse Regiment (Queensland Mounted Infantry) took part in Exercise Damascus 23 in March at Wide Bay Training Area. A Squadron, assisted by elements of Support Squadron, conducted live fire and tactical operations in the Boxer Combat Reconnaissance Vehicle (CRV) as they continue their training progression ahead of Talisman Sabre 23. The exercise also enhanced soldiers’ abilities in the Boxer CRV, as they continued to test its capability following its introduction to use in 2021.
